raytracer.primitives
Class Box

java.lang.Object
  raytracer.primitives.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoxedGroup
public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements Intersectable

Box object that can be placed in the scene.

Author:
(c) 2009-11 Roland Fraedrich

Constructor with minimum and maximum corner of the box.

min - Minimum corner of the box (with lowest x, y, z).
max - Maximum corner of the box (with highest x, y, z).

public Box(Vector3d min,
           Vector3d max,
           Material material)
Constructor with minimum, maximum and material.

Parameters:
min - Vector of lower x, y and z corner of the box.
max - Vector of higher x, y and z corner of the box.
material - Material for all sides of the box.

Description copied from interface: Intersectable
Returns the closest intersection of the ray and the object.

Specified by:

Parameters:

Returns:
